name: Realm Portal
info: With the Dragon Heart's power, you can now access other dimensions. A dimensional scholar seeks your aid to open a portal to the Void Realm, Master the forbidden arts of dimensional magic and become the first to traverse the boundaries between worlds.
dialogs: The barriers between realms grow thin. With your power, we can breach them safely.
I am ready to explore beyond our world. What do you need?
The portal frame must be forged with perfect precision, or reality itself could tear.
The portal is complete! Step through and witness the infinite cosmos.
accept: I am ready to explore beyond our world. What do you need?
